item.title: 'Monumental betrayal' - cheapest World Cup final ticket to cost Â£3,119
item.description: Fans' group Football Supporters Europe says it is "astonished" by the "extortionate" pricing policy for World Cup tickets.

item.title: Sandie Peggie tribunal judgement amended after 'made up' quote row
item.description: The nurse has confirmed her legal team will appeal the findings of the tribunal which were published on Monday.

item.title: Elite Coast Guard squad and 'dark fleet' ship - what we know about US seizure of oil tanker
item.description: The US seizure of a crude oil ship is the latest in a series of escalations in the Trump administration's pressure campaign on Venezuela.

item.title: Ukraine hands US revised peace plan proposal, Germany says
item.description: The latest draft includes proposals on territorial concessions, Germany's chancellor says.

item.title: From Iran to China to Venezuela - how tanker seized by US hid true location
item.description: A seized tanker accused of smuggling sanctioned oil has long hidden its true location. BBC Verify examines how.
